I'm to the point where I think this anime is not worth watching. Why are there so few good anime? I've watched tons of anime but I can count the good ones on one hand -mushishi, future diary, death note, rage of bahamut, hunter x hunter. I would include one piece but oda is the guy that came up with the annoying format of fights lasting20-30 episodes at a time. One Piece should have concluded five years ago
Bro, stop complaining and leave

Then I think you don't want anime much? Haikyuu ,code geass , aot, fmab, vivy, rezero , grand blue, one punch man ,steins gate, fate zero , food wars (if you like acchi) etc are good anime . A masterpiece can't be developed in short time and for one piece their are lot of character which we don't know their real strength even after 1037 chapters. So I can't understand how you believe it should have finished 5 years ago?

it should have finished ten years ago. eichiro oda is slow walking the story to completion so he can milk every last penny from the franchise. If you've watched this whole anime just imagine how many hours you've spent watching luffy or whoever run from one place to another. Luffy will get a shot in on the enemy and then he miraculously ends up a half mile away and then there's another two episodes of luffy running back to fight the enemy. it's so tedious
I think you are a type of a person who like overpowered protagonist. I think that you like things to get over quickly. You only like the end product but don't enjoy the process / journey

no, I don't like oda's tactic of drawing the story out 10 times longer than it should be just so he can keep his franchise up and running. It doesn't improve the story at all, it just makes oda more money

you're an e-diot who doesn't understand a thing about world building. You're too dumb to even realize that it's the anime that draws things out since it's weekly. I hope to God that you never recommend people shit. They'd be missing out on so much good stuff.

It has been bugging me for a while, but on the light novel Lena is called as Bloody Reigna (which kind of translates into Bloody Queen) not Bloody Regina. For those who have read the LN, can you explain to me why her call sign is different in the anime?

Reigna or "Reyna" means queen in Spanish, while Regina means Queen in latin translation. It can be just a decision made by the translators, but it can also mean a lot of things regarding the history of honoring virgin Mary. But to simplify things, both means queen but in different languages.
Could be a translation error

Theres so much cgi in this anime but then the cgi looks so good--

CGI doesn't necessarily translate to bad and the CGI we refer to as bad usually is the ones where they don't have the time/money to deal with certain scenes. Haven't seen much CG designs from A-1 but have at least seen them use cg effects in fights that made it look better. Good job on A-1, this is easily one of their top adaptations and there is a decent amount of CGI studios/anime that are good though ofc it's sometimes a matter of taste and use the 3 episode rule on the CG ones (recommend ajin, beastars, knights of sidonia and houseki no kuni)
